gold.user: As a project manager, I want to retrieve all issue type schemes available in the Jira Cloud platform so that I can understand the different configurations available for my projects.
gold.ideal: The response should include a list of all issue type schemes with their IDs, names, and descriptions.

gold.user: As a Jira administrator, I want to create a new issue type scheme to better organize the issue types for my projects, ensuring that they align with our workflow.
gold.ideal: The response should confirm the creation of the issue type scheme and return its ID and details.

gold.user: As a developer, I need to get the mapping of issue type schemes to projects to ensure that the correct issue types are available for each project.
gold.ideal: The response should provide a mapping of each project to its corresponding issue type scheme.

gold.user: As a project lead, I want to retrieve the issue type scheme assigned to my project to verify that it meets our requirements.
gold.ideal: The response should return the issue type scheme details associated with the specified project.

gold.user: As a project manager, I want to assign a specific issue type scheme to my project to ensure that the correct issue types are used.
gold.ideal: The response should confirm the assignment of the issue type scheme to the project.

gold.user: As a Jira administrator, I want to delete an obsolete issue type scheme to keep our configurations clean and manageable.
gold.ideal: The response should confirm the deletion of the specified issue type scheme.

gold.user: As a project administrator, I want to update the details of an existing issue type scheme to reflect changes in our project requirements.
gold.ideal: The response should confirm the update and return the updated issue type scheme details.

gold.user: As a project manager, I want to add new issue types to an existing issue type scheme to accommodate new workflows in our project.
gold.ideal: The response should confirm the addition of the issue types to the specified issue type scheme.

gold.user: As a project lead, I want to reorder the issue types in an issue type scheme to prioritize certain types for our team.
gold.ideal: The response should confirm the new order of issue types in the specified issue type scheme.

gold.user: As a Jira administrator, I want to remove an issue type from an issue type scheme that is no longer relevant to our projects.
gold.ideal: The response should confirm the removal of the specified issue type from the issue type scheme.
